resources.string:
1. A random word will be chosen for you to guess.

 2. Start guessing letters using the built in keyboard. You can only guess one letter once.

 3. If you guess correctly, the letter will appear on a display to show you what letters you have guessed correctly.

 4. You have 6 lives to guess the whole word.

 5. Each time you guess an incorrect letter, another limb will be added to the hangman!

 6. Guess the word correctly without exhausting your lives, and you save the hangman!
